item.title: SOFI
item.description: score:95 Chances: SoFi’s Earnings Report Was Rock Solid. Here’s Why the Stock Is a Screaming Buy. SoFi Snags Higher Price Target as Investors Show ‘More Sustained Interest’ A Bull Market Is Coming: 3 Exceptional Growth Stocks to Buy Now and Hold for a Decade SoFi Named to CNBC World’s Top Fintech Companies 2023 List SoFi Has More Than Doubled.
